description:
When Shinozaki visits Kosaka`s house, he discovers that Kosaka`s attractive mother is just as odd as her daughter. Later, Kosaka furiously studies for their first date.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: Ah, This Is My First Time Having Two at Once...
Ah, This Is My First Time Having Two at Once...
Deux en même temps, c`est la première fois pour moi
N, Nihon Douji wa Hajimete... Desu.
んっ, 二本同時は初めて... です.
읏, 두 개 동시는 처음... 이에요
